statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sales_id, genre, total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT album_id, total_sales, release_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT genre, COUNT(*) AS genre_count FROM sales_data GROUP BY genre;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sales_id, genre, total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT album_id, genre, total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_sales ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sales_id, album_id, genre FROM sales_data WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE total_sales > 5000 AND genre IN ('Rock', 'Pop') ORDER BY genre, total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres;
SELECT album_name, sales_total FROM albums;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT album_name FROM albums ORDER BY sales_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_id FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE genre_id = 3 AND sales_total > 1000;
SELECT album_name, sales_total FROM albums ORDER BY sales_total DESC;
SELECT album_name, genre_name FROM albums INNER JOIN genres ON albums.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT album_name, release_date, genre_name FROM albums INNER JOIN genres ON albums.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(album_id) AS total_albums FROM genres LEFT JOIN albums ON genres.genre_id = albums.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT genre_name, album_name, release_date FROM genres INNER JOIN albums ON genres.genre_id = albums.genre_id WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_id FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name ASC;
SELECT album_name, album_sales FROM albums WHERE album_sales > 1000;
SELECT track_name, track_length FROM tracks WHERE track_length > 180 ORDER BY track_length DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT album_name, album_sales FROM albums WHERE genre_id = 2 ORDER BY album_sales DESC;
SELECT track_name, track_length FROM tracks ORDER BY track_length ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT genre_name, album_name, track_name FROM genres g JOIN albums a ON g.genre_id = a.genre_id JOIN tracks t ON a.album_id = t.album_id;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM albums;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT album_name, genre FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM tracks WHERE duration > TIME '00:05:00';
SELECT album_name, sales_amount FROM albums WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums;
SELECT track_name, duration, genre FROM tracks ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT genre_name AS genre, COUNT(*) AS album_count FROM albums JOIN genres ON albums.genre = genres.genre_name GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT album_name, total_price FROM albums INNER JOIN sales ON albums.album_id = sales.album_id WHERE sales.quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM top_selling_albums WHERE sales_count > 500 ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
